title: My House Is a Magic Power Spot ~Just by Living There I Become the Strongest in the World~ - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Mature   Mecha   Romance   Shounen   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manga   Aristocracy   Carefree Protagonist   Demi-Humans   Demons   Dense Protagonist   Dragons   Dungeons   First-time Interc**rse   Golems   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Kingdoms   Lack of Common Sense   Loli   Male Protagonist   Merchants   Monsters   Overpowered Protagonist   Pregnancy   R-15   Royalty   Sentient Objects   Spirit Advisor   Spirits   Sword And Magic   Transported Modern Structure   Transported to Another World   Unreliable Narrator   Werebeasts   Witches   Youkai
author: Amaui Shiroichi   あまうい白一
description: Living carefree at home is the greatest shortcut—- My house is the world’s greatest magic power spot, that being the case both my house and I were summoned to another world by some guys who were aiming for it. However, I’ve been living in this place for many years and my body is, apparently, abnormally overflowing with magic. Due to some unforeseen circumstances by those guys who summoned me, they quickly ran away. Be that as it may, there are some ill-mannered people who covet the magic leaking out of my house. I won’t give up my house to those people! I’m going to wield my power as I please!>
